Question
========
  
What is the strongest research design to test mediation? 
Answerlist
----------
* Experimental research in which *M* was experimentally manipulated.
* Experimental research in which *M* and *Y* were measured repeatedly.
* Longitudinal research in which *X* was measured prior to *M*, and *M* was measured prior to *Y*.
* Cross-sectional research in which correlations between *X*, *M* and *Y* are modeled.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
